SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^TC.*/  AND "statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction" , time($aggregation) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^TC.*/  AND "statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^TC.*/  AND ("statut" = 'ko' or "statut" = 'ok' ) AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^TC.*/  AND "statut" = 'ko' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction" , time($aggregation) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^TC.*/  AND "statut" = 'ko' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^TC.*/  AND ("statut" = 'ko' or "statut" = 'ok' ) AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count")  FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") AS "error" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("error") / sum("all") FROM (SELECT sum("count") AS "all" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)), (SELECT sum("countError") AS "error" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null))
SELECT sum("count")  FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"

SELECT count FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "responseCode" !~ /^$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^[<_|>_].*/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", "responseCode","responseMessage"
SELECT last("maxAT") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /[<|>].*/  AND "statut" = 'ko' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  time($aggregation) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /[<|>].*/  AND ("statut" = 'ok' or statut = 'ko') AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  time($aggregation) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /[<|>].*/  AND  "statut" = 'ok'  AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  time($aggregation) fill(null)

SELECT mean("avg") FROM "$measurement_name"  WHERE (("statut" = 'ko' or "statut" = 'ok')  AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^[<|>].*/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s) fill(null)

panels.title: Transactions Response Times (avg) По всем запросам общее

targets.query: SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^TC.*/  AND "statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^TC.*/  AND "statut" = 'ko' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^TC.*/  AND ("statut" = 'ko' or "statut" = 'ok' ) AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation) fill(null)

panels.title: Общая интенсивность шагов сценариев по успешности

targets.query: SELECT last("pct95.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE (("statut" = 'ko' or "statut" = 'ok') AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^TC.*/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time(60s) fill(null)

panels.title: Transactions Response Times (95th pct) По всем шагам сценариев

targets.query: SELECT last("pct95.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^TC.*/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time(60s) fill(null)

panels.title: Transactions Response Times (95th pct) Успешные шаги сценариев

targets.query: SELECT last("pct95.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("statut" = 'ko' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^TC.*/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time(60s) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT mean("pct95.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE (("statut" = 'ko' or "statut" = 'ok') AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^TC.*/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  time(60s) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "belialfff" WITH KEY = "application"
list.name: application
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "belialfff" WITH KEY = "application"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "belialfff" WITH KEY = "transaction" WHERE "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all'
